com.rohanclan.cfml.util
Class ResourceUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.util.ResourceUtils
public class ResourceUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This is a helper class to provide various useful methods that related to Eclipse resources (IResource) and any other class derived from IResource (e.g. IFile, IFolder, etc.).

Author:
Oliver Tupman

static java.util.Set getIResourceSurroundingResources(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource res, java.lang.String pathSoFar)
          Gets suggestions for filenames & directories in the same directory as the current resource + the pathname supplied.
Therefore a resource in \Fred\Dir supplied with a pathSoFar of "..\" would result in the list of pathnames that exist in \Fred (including the entry 'Dir') If pathSoFar is "..\a" then the list of pathnames will be \Fred\a*"

Method Detail

getIResourceSurroundingResources

public static java.util.Set getIResourceSurroundingResources(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource res,
                                                             java.lang.String pathSoFar)
Gets suggestions for filenames & directories in the same directory as the current resource + the pathname supplied.
Therefore a resource in \Fred\Dir supplied with a pathSoFar of "..\" would result in the list of pathnames that exist in \Fred (including the entry 'Dir') If pathSoFar is "..\a" then the list of pathnames will be \Fred\a*"

Parameters:
res - The resource to find the file around
pathSoFar - The path current typed in.
Returns:
The list of suggestions based upon the resource & pathSoFar supplied

getProjectNatures

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IProjectNature[] getProjectNatures(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject srcProject)
                                                                     throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Gets an array of the project natures associated with the supplied project.

Parameters:
srcProject - The project to get the natures from
Returns:
An array of natures
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - Thrown by methods called

hasNature

public static boolean hasNature(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project2Check,
                                java.lang.String natureID)
                         throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Checks whether a project has the supplied nature applied to it.

Parameters:
project2Check - The project to check
natureID - The ID of the nature to check for
Returns:
true - nature applied, false - not yet
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

applyNature

public static void applyNature(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project2ApplyTo,
                               java.lang.String natureID)
                        throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Applies the CFE nature to the supplied project. If the nature is already applied it will return.

Parameters:
project2ApplyTo - The project to apply the nature to.
natureID - The ID of the nature to apply to the project
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

removeNature

public static void removeNature(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                java.lang.String natureID)
                         throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Removes the CFE nature from a project. If the project does not have the nature it simply returns.

Parameters:
project - Project to remove the nature from.
natureID - The ID of the nature to remove
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
